title: RustFS - MinIO Domestic Alternative, High-Performance Distributed Storage
description: RustFS is a high-performance object storage developed with the world's most popular and best-performing memory-safe Rust language. It's open-source, OSS-compatible, Kubernetes-native cloud storage designed for AI and other cloud-native workloads. Suitable for enterprises building private cloud storage, hybrid cloud storage, and distributed storage, it's also a domestic alternative to MinIO.
keywords: RustFS, MinIO, distributed storage, high performance, high security, high concurrency, S3, Rust, cloud native, storage bucket, Bucket, storage, object storage, MinIO domestic alternative

hero.description: RustFS is developed with the popular and secure Rust language, compatible with S3 protocol. Suitable for AI/ML, massive data storage, big data, internet, industrial and confidential storage scenarios. Nearly free to use. Follows Apache 2 license, supports domestic confidential devices and systems.
hero.trustedOpenSource: Trusted open-source software with over 1500+ software protocol compatibility adaptations

features.distributedArchitectureDescription: RustFS leverages distributed architecture and object storage capabilities to provide exceptional performance for AI and advanced analytics workloads, supporting data scaling from TB to EB levels.
features.rustyVaultIntegrationDescription: RustFS integrates with RustyVault to provide high-performance object storage security encryption, supporting multiple encryption modes to ensure data security and transparency.
features.versionControlDescription: Object storage version control feature assigns unique identifiers to each object version, allowing users to access and manage historical versions through API or management interface.
features.scalingDescription: RustFS system automatically balances node load, ensures even data distribution, supports dynamic addition or removal of resources based on storage needs, achieving unlimited scaling.
features.wormDescription: Supports object locking mode, implementing WORM (Write Once Read Many) functionality, preventing data from being modified or deleted within specified time ranges, ensuring data integrity.
features.replicationDescription: Automatically creates multiple copies when objects are written and distributes them to different nodes, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous replication modes, providing high availability and disaster recovery capabilities.
features.comprehensiveFeaturesDescription: Comprehensive features to meet enterprise-grade storage requirements

multiCloud.title: True Multi-Cloud Storage
multiCloud.description: Multi-cloud object storage allows enterprises to build AWS S3-compatible data infrastructure on any cloud. The result is a consistent, portable interface for data and applications - meaning you can run anywhere, from edge to public cloud, without changing a single line of code.
multiCloud.publicCloudDescription: RustFS is powered by Kubernetes, providing scalable, secure, S3-compatible object storage for every public cloud. Free yourself from vendor lock-in and treat the cloud for what it is - commodity compute, networking, and drives.
multiCloud.privateCloudDescription: From OpenShift to Tanzu, RustFS is the only object storage that serves as the infrastructure foundation for leading Kubernetes distributions. With its vast portfolio of integrated applications, RustFS completes the software-defined picture.
multiCloud.edgeDescription: RustFS multi-cloud storage complete binaries are under 100MB, capable of powering object storage anywhere - from ARM SOCs, 5G POPs, and edge caching devices to mini data centers. This is why RustFS dominates edge storage markets.
